metce:Process.gml:description: WMO No. 49 Volume 2 Meteorological Service for International Air Navigation APPENDIX 3 TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS RELATED TO METEOROLOGICAL OBSERVATIONS AND REPORTS

om:observedProperty.xlink:title: Observed properties for Meteorological Aerodrome Observation Reports (METAR and SPECI)

avi:Process.gml:description: This document has been automatically created based on the original METAR/SPECI code message included in the 'input' element.Note: This is NOT an authoritative aviation weather report. It SHOULD NOT be used as a weather report to be used in flight planning or other aviation related use.
avi:Process.avi:input: METAR EFJY 060320Z AUTO VRB01KT 9999 FEW002 09/08 Q1002=
